N

Node - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK
Represent an object that can export some data (feature) using the ble connection
Node(BluetoothDevice, int, byte[]) - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Node
create a new node
Node(byte[]) - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Node
create a new node from the advertise, the advertise have to contain the mac address
Node.BleConnectionParamUpdateListener - Interface in com.st.BlueSTSDK
Interface used for notify change on the ble connection
Node.Mode - Enum in com.st.BlueSTSDK
possible node working mode, if a node is build the board is in Application mode
Node.NodeStateListener - Interface in com.st.BlueSTSDK
Interface where notify that the node change its internal state
Node.State - Enum in com.st.BlueSTSDK
state of the node
Node.Type - Enum in com.st.BlueSTSDK
node type, board that will answer to the connection
NodeEmulator - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK
This class represents a node that don't used a ble connection for extract the data but generate fake data.
NodeEmulator(Class<? extends Feature>[]) - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.NodeEmulator
 
NodeEmulator() - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.NodeEmulator
create a emulate node that emulate the feature in the array NodeEmulator.DEFAULT_EMULATED_FEATURE
NodeEmulator.EmulableFeature - Interface in com.st.BlueSTSDK
interface that the emulated feature have to implement
notifyAutoConfigurationStart() - Method in class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureAutoConfigurable
call the method FeatureAutoConfigurable.FeatureAutoConfigurationListener.onAutoConfigurationStarting(FeatureAutoConfigurable) for each listener that subscribe to this feature.
notifyAutoConfigurationStatus(int) - Method in class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureAutoConfigurable
call the method FeatureAutoConfigurable.FeatureAutoConfigurationListener.onAutoConfigurationStatusChanged(FeatureAutoConfigurable, int) for each listener that subscribe to this feature.
notifyConfigurationFinished(int) - Method in class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features.FeatureAutoConfigurable
call the method FeatureAutoConfigurable.FeatureAutoConfigurationListener.onConfigurationFinished(FeatureAutoConfigurable, int) for each listener that subscribe to this feature.
notifyUpdate(Feature.Sample) - Method in class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Feature
call the method Feature.FeatureListener.onUpdate(Feature, Feature.Sample) for each listener that subscribe to this feature.
Nucleo_0_Features - Static variable in class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils.BLENodeDefines.FeatureCharacteristics
array that map a feature mask with a feature class, for a nucleo devices
NumberConversion - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils
This class help to convert bytes array to different formats values types and values types to byte array
NumberConversion() - Constructor for class com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils.NumberConversion
 
NumberConversion.BigEndian - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils
This class implements the conversion for bytes array to different formats values types and from values types to byte array for Big endian base order
NumberConversion.LittleEndian - Class in com.st.BlueSTSDK.Utils
This class implements the conversion for bytes array to different formats values types and from values types to byte array for little endian base order
